external_references.description: kate. (2020, September 25). APT-C-43 steals Venezuelan military secrets to provide intelligence support for the reactionaries — HpReact campaign. Retrieved November 20, 2020.

description: [Machete](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0095)'s [Machete](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0409) MSI installer has masqueraded as a legitimate Adobe Acrobat Reader installer.(Citation: 360 Machete Sep 2020)
